statements: SELECT * FROM bioenergy_compliance;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM bioenergy_compliance WHERE location='USA';
SELECT company_name, last_inspection_date FROM bioenergy_compliance WHERE compliance_status=true;
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_compliance WHERE compliance_status=false ORDER BY last_inspection_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM bioenergy_compliance WHERE sustainability_standard='ISO 14001' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT company_name, location FROM bioenergy_compliance WHERE sustainability_standard = 'ISO 14001';
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_compliance ORDER BY last_inspection_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, location, sustainability_standard FROM bioenergy_compliance WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT company_name, last_inspection_date FROM bioenergy_compliance WHERE sustainability_standard IN ('ISO 50001', 'RE100') ORDER BY company_name ASC, last_inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM bioregulatory_compliance
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM bioregulatory_compliance
SELECT * FROM bioregulatory_compliance WHERE id = 1
SELECT company_name FROM bioregulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT id, company_name FROM bioregulatory_compliance ORDER BY company_name
SELECT * FROM bioregulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT company_name FROM bioregulatory_compliance WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY company_name ASC
SELECT * FROM bioregulatory_compliance WHERE company_name LIKE '%Corp%'
SELECT id, company_name FROM bioregulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_compliance_issues FROM bioregulatory_compliance
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Regulations;
SELECT Regulation, Compliance_Status FROM Bioenergy_Regulations WHERE Compliance_Status = TRUE;
SELECT Standard_Name FROM Sustainability_Standards WHERE Certification_Status = FALSE;
SELECT ID, Tracking_Number, Quantity, Compliance_Status FROM Bioenergy_Tracking WHERE Quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Tracking ORDER BY Compliance_Status DESC, Quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Regulations WHERE Compliance_Status = TRUE
SELECT Standard_Name, Certification_Status FROM Sustainability_Standards ORDER BY Standard_Name ASC
SELECT ID, Regulation FROM Bioenergy_Regulations WHERE ID = 2
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Tracking WHERE Quantity > 100 ORDER BY Quantity DESC
SELECT Regulation, Compliance_Status FROM Bioenergy_Regulations WHERE ID IN (1, 3)
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards;
SELECT standard_name, issue_date FROM sustainability_standards;
SELECT project_name, production_capacity FROM bioenergy_production WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT parameter_name, test_date FROM quality_control ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT standard_name, description FROM sustainability_standards WHERE standard_name LIKE 'ISO%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY last_verification_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, production_capacity FROM bioenergy_production WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT parameter_name, test_date FROM quality_control WHERE acceptable_range IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT production_type, production_amount FROM bioenergy_production WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_records ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_production ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT production_type, production_amount FROM bioenergy_production WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_records ORDER BY join_date DESC;
